channel.title: linux on programming blog
channel.description: Recent content in linux on programming blog

item.title: Linux: File and directory permissions
item.description: CContinuing our series on Linux, today we’ll look at how to manage file and directory permissions.

item.title: Linux: User Management
item.description: Managing users in Linux is not as intuitive as it is in Windows, where you can do almost everything graphically and transparently.

item.title: Linux: Process Management - Part 2
item.description: In this post continuing with useful Linux management commands, we will learn how to check processes with the ‘ps’ command, send signals to processes with the ‘kill’, ‘killall’ and ‘pkill’ commands, foreground and background processes and how to change their priorities.

item.title: Linux: Process Management - Part 1
item.description: In today’s post we will talk about some useful process management commands in Linux.
